note.p: Education: St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1850), MA

Career: Made an orthnithological expedition to Algeria with Henry Tristram (FRS 1868) and Osbert Salvin (FRS 1873); also visited Greece and Turkey; held a commission in the Kent Artillery (militia) (1862-1867); took up geology; President, Geologists' Association; visited India (1895); purchased the estate of East Stoke (1897)
Memberships: FGS (1867, President 1892-1894); FCS; Mineralogical Society (President)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1909 vol 81 pp vi-x, plate, signed by H W
